nodes.name: submitBlock

devdoc.details: Manages the Stake for multiple clients in a decentralized consensus  system to trustlessly answer requests

activateStake(bytes32).details: Activate stake on a block producer

params.stakingId: - the tokenId of the staking token

cooldownStake(bytes32).details: Mark stake as cooled down so we can cache totals for voting

params.stakingId: - the tokenId of the staking token

getLatestBlock().return: the latest block submitted to the blockChain

params._governanceContract: - The contract that governs the blockProducer and actions of the system
params._token: - The ERC20 token to stake with

params.startIndex: if a batchable action, where to start

stake(address,uint256).details: This contract must be approved to transfer tokens by token holder

params._requests: list of the request ids (minus first 2 bytes)
params.previousBlock: the prior block to maintain the
params.signers: Stakees, aka diviners and must be passed in ascending order to check for dups
params.stakingBlock: the block number diviners get staking data for
params.supportingData: the hash of the supporting block data

submitBlock(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[],by.return: The hash of the new block

submitRequest(bytes32,uint256,address,ui.details: Escrow eth and xyo, making sure it covers the answer mining cost Stores new request in request pool

params.request: How to uniquely identify a request
params.requestType: based on the type we know which callback to call (string or bool)
params.xyoSender: who to deduct the xyo from for mining cost

params.stakingId: - the tokenId of the staking token

params.batchLimit: - Allows iterating over withdrawing due to gas limits if batchlimit is 0, try withdrawing all available tokens (be prepared for out of gas if you've got > 50 tokens)

withdrawRewardsRequest(uint256).details: Withdraw reward balance can post same params via raw

params.stakingId: - the tokenId of the staking token to remove

devdoc.title: XyStakingConsensus

getAvailableStakeeUnstake(address).notice: Get the available unstake, counting only stakes that can be withdrawn

getAvailableStakerUnstake(address).notice: Get the available unstake, counting only stakes that can be withdrawn

resolveGovernanceAction(address,uint256,.notice: Call this when it's time to resolve a passed governance action

stake(address,uint256).notice: Adds stake to a stakable token id

submitBlock(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[],by.notice: Submit a new block to the consensus blockChain. Verifies stake in consensus is over 51% of the network.  calls requests' callbacks with responses.  Creates new block and returns weiMining for successful creation.

withdrawManyStake(uint256).notice: Withdraw a batch of first avaliable staking tokens

withdrawStake(bytes32).notice: Withdraw a single token's stake by token id, removes staking token
